alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Plateau, Book Cliffs (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 4:49AM MST until December 25 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches, locally higher. * WHERE...Wasatch Plateau/Book Cliffs. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 8 AM MST this morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 11 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected on all mountain routes, particularly Sunday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A second winter storm will impact the area with the potential for a period of moderate snow Sunday morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
